cont.entity_a: SD card needed for additional memory. Upgradeable with an SD card. Expandable memory with SD card slot. Comes with FM tuner and expandable memory.
cont.entity_b: FM radio included but lacks memory for favorite stations.

cont.entity_a: Affordable alternative to more expensive brands. Affordable with decent sound quality and features.

Lightweight and straightforward to use. Controls are easy to learn but not intuitive. Easy to download music and lightweight design. Compact design with large buttons. Easy to load music with popular formats.
cont.entity_b: Very compact. Ergonomically designed for running and in-car use. Menu system is intuitive.

cont.entity_a: Uses replaceable AAA batteries. Non-rechargeable battery can be a drawback for audiobooks. Battery door is flimsy; use the provided case for protection. Battery use is high; carry spares.
cont.entity_b: Great controls, sound, and battery life.

cont.entity_a: Sound quality is better than expected with the equalizer. Plays music well, but menu language issue may require contacting the company. Noticeable distortion with certain MP3 files. Comfortable headphones with good sound quality. Headphones provided are of poor quality; recommend upgrading. Volume control issues and menu navigation can be slow.
cont.entity_b: User-friendly customization on equalization. Supports ATRAC and MP3 formats. Sound quality is excellent, but proprietary software is required for music transfer. Good tuner and sound quality.

cont.entity_a: Loaded with accessories including sync cable, protective case, armband, and quality earphones. FM receiver included.
Software is not reliable for arranging files and can freeze during playback.
cont.entity_b: Software is more solid than previous versions but locks to one PC. Software limits transfer to one computer. Software can be cumbersome to use. Cannot directly copy MP3 files; requires conversion. Proprietary format limits usability with multiple PCs.
Difficult to read display in daylight. Display is hard to see in sunlight.
Refurbished units perform well and are reliable.

cont.entity_a: No playlist creation feature; manual song selection required. Limited file organization; plays songs in alphabetical order.
cont.entity_b: Limited navigation options; only search by song or album. Difficulties with audio book loading and file organization.

cont.entity_a: Customer service from Amazon is excellent.
